mapper.select: SELECT m.mname "mname" ,lf.lname "lname" ,l.lyear "lyear" ,l.term "term" ,l.schedule "schedule" ,l.lrcode "lrcode" ,p.pname "pname" ,l.opennum "opennum" FROM score_mana sc LEFT JOIN lecture l ON sc.opennum=l.opennum JOIN lecture_info lf ON l.lnum=lf.lnum JOIN major m ON m.mcode= lf.mcode JOIN professor p ON l.pid=p.pid WHERE sc.sid=#{sid} AND l.datestatus='수강중'

SELECT lf.lname "lname" ,l.lyear "lyear" ,l.term "term" ,hw.pcomment "pcomment" ,hw.pperiod "pperiod" ,hw.register_date "registerDate" ,hw.register_id "registerId" ,l.opennum "opennum" ,trunc(hw.pperiod)-trunc(sysdate) "hwstatus" ,(select count(*) from hw_student hs where hs.register_id=hw.register_id and submit_sid=#{sid}) "submitCheck" ,(select hs.score from hw_student hs where hs.register_id=hw.register_id and submit_sid=#{sid}) "score" FROM lecture l JOIN lecture_info lf ON l.lnum=lf.lnum JOIN hw_professor hw ON l.opennum=hw.opennum WHERE l.opennum=#{opennum}

SELECT register_file "registerFile" ,register_Id "registerId" ,opennum "opennum" ,register_date "registerDate" ,pperiod "pperiod" ,pcomment "pcomment" FROM hw_professor WHERE register_id=#{registerId} AND opennum=#{opennum}

SELECT fir.lname "lname" ,fir.lyear "lyear" ,fir.term "term" ,hp.pcomment "pcomment" ,hp.pperiod "pperiod" ,hs.score "score" ,hp.register_id "registerId" ,hs.submit_sid "submitSid" ,hp.opennum "opennum" ,to_date(to_char(hp.pperiod,'yyyymmdd'))-trunc(sysdate) "hwstatus" ,hp.register_date "registerDate" FROM hw_professor hp JOIN hw_student hs ON hp.register_id=hs.register_id JOIN (select * from lecture lc JOIN lecture_info lf on lc.lnum=lf.lnum) fir ON hp.opennum=fir.opennum WHERE hs.submit_sid =#{sid} and fir.datestatus='수강중'
